::Jhiaxus/Zarak::
   
  They both follow Hydras to the CR room.
   
  Jhiaxus: I rather like that idea...
   
  Jhiaxus gets into a CR tank.
   
  Jhiaxus: I look forward to play time once I'm repaired.
   
  Zarak removes his exo suit and puts it in a tank. He starts seaching for any kind of bandages and what not to help his rib heal.

adecuate measures in order that he still belive that she is dead"
